comments.author: bimsland@mozilla.com
comments.text:
This should deploy on every commit to `production`.

We don't currently know what the "pretty" domain will be, so will just use the generated `dataops.mozgcp.net` domain for now.
comments.creator: bimsland@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
This should deploy on every commit to `production`.

We don't currently know what the "pretty" domain will be, so will just use the generated `dataops.mozgcp.net` domain for now.

comments.creator: bimsland@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: This environment is now set up and available at https://growth-prod.bespoke.prod.dataops.mozgcp.net.
